title: Vampire Survivors gets a new bonus stage, 2 new characters, 4 new weapons
description: Vampire Survivors continues to expand with more free content, and the latest update is out now that sees you battle it out in space with new characters.

title: Extraction horror shooter Level Zero: Extraction will get Steam Deck support
description: Level Zero: Extraction is an upcoming extraction horror with high-stakes asymmetric PvPvPvE and FPS combat, and according to the developer they will add Steam Deck support.

title: Single-player extraction shooter ZERO Sievert adds controller support
description: ZERO Sievert is a top-down pixel-art single-player survival shooter from CABO Studio and Modern Wolf, and now it should be a lot nicer on Steam Deck or Desktop PCs with controllers.

title: Grab more great games in the Humble Creative Sandbox Bundle
description: Here's a pretty darn good selection of games that you can pick up in the Humble Creative Sandbox Bundle.

title: The HDMI Forum rejected AMD's open source HDMI 2.1 implementation
description: If you were hoping at some point to see HDMI 2.1+ on Linux with AMD + Mesa, you're out of luck right now as it's simply not going to be happening.

title: Open-source Vulkan driver for NVIDIA hardware in Mesa, NVK, is now ready for prime time
description: The future of NVIDIA hardware on Linux is here with the open source Vulkan driver NVK in Mesa, as there's now a Merge Request to have it shipped by default.

title: Valve fixes Remote Play on Steam Deck
description: After recently releasing a big Stable Steam Client update for Steam Deck and Desktop PCs, I highlighted that Remote Play was broken on Steam Deck - and so Valve has now fixed it.
